alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Valley; Western Roosevelt (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 7:03PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Roosevelt and east central Valley Counties through 800 PM MDT... At 703 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southeast of St. Marie, or 17 miles northeast of Glasgow, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wolf Point, Lustre and Volt. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for northeastern Montana.
